dmca.title: Copyright Infringement/Abuse/Harassment of others
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: spartan master [mailto:spartanmaster@hotmail.com] 
Sent: Saturday, April 23, 2005 2:36 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright Infringement/Abuse/Harassment of others

This is now a serious situation where one of your customers with the ip
12.96.164.200 Your customer is engaging in the act of freely distributing
copyrighted art/work. It has also come to my attention that this customer is
harassing/abusing other users of the internet. I have alerted the artists
owning this material and they should be contacting you soon. It also came to
my attention that this customer of yours has been taken to court for this
offense once before. Thank you for your time on behalf of the Artists and
internet users.

_________________________________________________________________
